title: Classroom Observation Assessment and Ecobehavioral Analysis (EBAA)-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational behavior analysis theory and educational assessment methodologies
context.additional_context: Enhancing classroom observation and data-driven instructional design competencies using EBAA tools in an online environment.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze teacher-student interactions in the classroom using the EBAA 5 major observation tools
Learners can design instructional strategies to address academic achievement gaps based on observational data
Learners can perform real-time instructional intervention decision-making using observation recording software (such as CORA) in digital environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
